message.name: ERR_DECISION_FV_CASESTATUS
message.locale: Decisions can only be maintained for active Judicial Review cases.

message.name: ERR_DECISION_FV_DECISIONDOCUMENTMISSING
message.locale: File location and reference number must be specified.

message.name: ERR_JUDICIALREVIEW_FV_ORIGINALCASEID
message.locale: The parent case id must be entered.

message.name: ERR_JUDICIALREVIEW_FV_ORGINDICATOR
message.locale: The organization cannot be both the appellant and the respondent.
The organisation cannot be both the appellant and the respondent.

message.name: ERR_JUDICIALREVIEW_FV_CASEPARTICIPANT
message.locale: A judicial review cannot have both an appellant participant and a respondent participant.

message.name: ERR_JUDICIALREVIEW_FV_INTEGRATEDCASE
message.locale: The case under appeal cannot be an integrated case.

message.name: ERR_JUDICIALREVIEW_FV_ACTIVEREVIEW
message.locale: There already is an active judicial review on this case.

message.name: ERR_JUDICIALREVIEW_FV_APPELLANT
message.locale: An appellant must be specified.

message.name: ERR_JUDICIALREVIEW_FV_RESPONDENT
message.locale: A respondent must be specified.

message.name: ERR_JUDICIALREVIEW_FV_APPELLANTTONCASE
message.locale: The appellant was not a participant on the original case.

message.name: ERR_JUDICIALREVIEW_FV_RESPONDENTTONCASE
message.locale: The respondent was not a participant on the original case.

message.name: ERR_JUDICIALREVIEW_FV_CLOSEDHEARINGREVIEW
message.locale: This case must be linked to a closed hearing review.

message.name: ERR_JUDICIALREVIEW_FV_CLOSEDHEARINGCASE
message.locale: This case must be linked to a closed hearing case.

message.name: ERR_JUDICIALREVIEW_FV_ORGASRESPONDENT
message.locale: The organization must be the respondent on this case.
The organisation must be the respondent on this case.

message.name: ERR_JUDICIALREVIEW_FV_ORGASAPPELLANT
message.locale: The organization must be the appellant on this case.
The organisation must be the appellant on this case.

message.name: INF_JUDICIALREVIEW_TRANSCRIPTSUBJECT
message.locale: Transcription request

message.name: INF_JUDICIALREVIEW_SENDTRANSCRIPTREASON
message.locale: A transcript must be sent to the appellant in this case.

message.name: INF_JUDICIALREVIEW_LETTERCOMMREASON
message.locale: A transcript has been requested for this case.

message.name: INF_JUDICIALREVIEW_FV_CASEUNDERAPPEAL
message.locale: The case %1s is under appeal.

message.name: INF_TRANSCRIPTION_COMM_SUBJECT
message.locale: Judicial Review Transcription

message.name: ERR_JUDICIALREVIEW_CLOSEMISSINGDECISION
message.locale: A decision must be recorded before closing this case.

message.name: ERR_JUDICIALREVIEW_CLOSEINVALIDCASESTATUS
message.locale: The case is already closed.

message.name: ERR_JUDICIALREVIEW_ORGASAPPELLANT_FORPETITION
message.locale: Court petitions can only be generated if the organization is the appellant.
Court petitions can only be generated if the organisation is the appellant.

message.name: INF_JUDICIALREVIEW_SUBJECTTEXT
message.locale: Appeal Notice
